name: needle-arm
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Attacks with thorny arms. May cause flinching.
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks with thorny arms. May cause flinching.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack using thorny arms. It may make the foe flinch.
